titleStmt.title: The first, last, or, The formal hypocrite further from salvation (as to the way of God's ordinary working) than the prophane sinner being the substance of several sermons preached in course at a lecture in the countrey / by J.O. ...

notesStmt.note: Written by John Oldfield. Cf. DNB.
